InvoiceErrorDetailEvent.name: InvoiceErrorDetailEvent
InvoiceErrorDetailEvent.description: Represents information about the errors that occurred during the processing of a /commerce/billing/invoices request. This object is included in an InvoiceProcessedEvent platform event message. You can't subscribe to InvoiceProcessedEvent platform event directly.

ErrorCode.description: Reference code for the type of error that occurred.

ErrorMessage.description: Information about the error that occurred during processing.

ErrorSourceId.description: The ID of the record where the error occurred. This record can be an invoice or a billing schedule.

EventUuid.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID) that identifies a platform event message.
